Biography

HIGH SCHOOL

Instinctive in-state linebacker with size, speed and range who comes from a championship pedigree at Lipscomb Academy in Nashville … Enrolled at Tennessee in March after graduating high school early and participated in spring practice … A consensus four-star prospect and top-10 player from the state of Tennessee by all major recruiting services … The No. 10 player from Tennessee and No. 30 linebacker according to On3 … Rated No. 9 in the Volunteer State and No. 31 at his position by 247Sports … The No. 19 linebacker in the country and No. 6 player from Tennessee according to Rivals … Tabbed No. 7 in the state and No. 24 at his position by ESPN … 2024 Polynesian Bowl participant in Honolulu, Hawaii … Amassed 305 tackles and 49 tackles for loss over the course of his high school career at Lipscomb Academy … Played nine games his senior season and racked up 87 tackles, 27 TFLs, three sacks and three pass breakups … Earned Div. II-3A All-Region honors in 2023 … Leading tackler for the Mustangs in 2022, posting 101 total tackles, 14.5 TFLs, two sacks and six pass breakups as junior … Helped Lipscomb Academy to a 13-0 record and second consecutive state title his junior season … Named to the MaxPreps Junior All-America Team and the TSWA Div. II-AA All-State Team in 2022 … Chose Tennessee over 33 other Division I offers, including 10 SEC programs … Committed to the Vols in July 2023 … Coached by former NFL Pro Bowlers Trent Dilfer and Kevin Mawae.

PERSONAL

Full name is Edwin Michael Spillman … Born on Nov. 5, 2005, in Freetown, Sierra Leone in West Africa … Parents are Melissa and Jeremy Spillman … His brother, Nate, is a freshman wide receiver for the Vols … Adopted and came to the United States in 2013, arriving in Nashville on Nov. 25, 2013 … Plans to major in business administration ... Favorite movie is The Green Mile … Favorite TV shows are The Office and Kickin’ It … X handle is @ESpillman13 … Instagram handle is @edwin_spillman
